**Announcement - Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)**
-----------------------------------------------------

**Title:** Supply and Installation of One CNC Milling Machine
--------------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** PW-__HN-331-81348
**Solicitation Number:** M7594-222605/A

**Publication Date:** August 17, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** September 1, 2022, at 2:00 PM Ottawa Time

**Background:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)requires the supply and installation of one Computer Numerically Controlled (CNC) milling machine, specifically the HAAS VM-2 with TRT160 5-Axis CNC Machine or equivalent, at 1426 St. Joseph Blvd, RM 1640, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R2.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful bidder will provide and install the CNC milling machine, including accessories, installation, and training. The bidder must meet the minimum specifications and requirements outlined in Annex A - Statement of Work and APPENDIX A: MINIMUM CRITERIA FOR ACAN FROM THE CNC MILLING MACHINE.

**Critical Requirements:**

* The CNC machine must be capable of operating within a specific physical space (125" height x 125" width x 145" depth)
* The machine must have a programmable tool changer with a minimum capacity of thirty (30) tools
* The machine must be directly compatible with HAAS HRT 210 and HAAS HA5C rotary indexers
* The machine must have a spindle with a minimum travel of (30" x 20" x 20") and a maximum speed of at least 12,000 RPM
* The machine must include a table with a minimum size of 36" x 18" and a minimum weight capacity of 2,200 lbs

**Statement of Capabilities:**
Suppliers who believe they are fully qualified and available to provide the services/goods described in this ACAN may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice. The statement of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

**Key Dates:**

* Closing date for a submission of a statement of capabilities: September 1, 2022, at 2:00 PM Ottawa Time
* Estimated delivery and installation date: March 31, 2023
